title: Japan Workers' Households Ratio of Net Savings and Insurance
description: Household Saving Rate in Japan decreased to 19.50 percent in September from 27 percent in August of 2022. Personal Savings in Japan averaged 12.77 percent from 1963 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 62.10 percent in June of 2020 and a record low of -9.90 percent in May of 2012. In Japan, Workers' Households Ratio of Net Savings and Insurance corresponds to the ratio of income saved to net disposable income during a certain period of time. From Jan 2000 data, the survey includes agricultural, forestry and fisheries households. This page provides - Japan Workers Savings - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Statistics Bureau of Japan
